it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientHandlerInterfaceImpl, ClientHandlerSocket

    public abstract class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A Runnable abstract messages client-server handler to be implemented by classes using different connection types
    Author:
    Mirko
